text: Karl Justin Koepfer (born October 7, 1934) is a former American football player who played for Detroit Lions of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Bowling Green State University. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Bowling Green Falcons football players Category:Detroit Lions players Category:American football offensive linemen Category:People from Swanton, Ohio
title: Karl Koepfer
